replies.body: I just really hate his 15% Magic Damage reduction and Magic Damage shield. It nullifies so much of FIzz's early game power, while having a ranged single target ability to poke with that Fizz can't answer. I used to basically kill everyone at lvl3 or 4 with Fizz, but it's so annoying with Kass I can't do it at least not until I'm level 6 and with Sheen.
I told you guys Kass would be insanely viable again....

some go kassa top to counter the new new ap tops 

(mao/nid/lulu,others)

i think it might be due the jungle re-work, see going kass pre jungle patch was either get no farm or suicide in the face of a 3 minute gank or 5 but with the the new jungle, junglers rarely gank pre 6 which makes kass laning much easier

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sVAjOE8Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-13T10:06:16.546+0000)
>
> i think it might be due the jungle re-work, see going kass pre jungle patch was either get no farm or suicide in the face of a 3 minute gank or 5 but with the the new jungle, junglers rarely gank pre 6 which makes kass laning much easier

Ehhh idk if thats it...

Seriously though, I've faced like 6 today. And I've only played like 7-8 games lol
Hes just a safe pick into anything mid lane that isn't yasuo or zed. The elixir start with his passive and combine with his Q shield just makes his lane phase a breeze imo.
